docs.text: mimi leder is probably best known for her stunning work as a director of the hit tv-show er .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: her mast famous episode , " love's labour lost " , dealt with the ordeal of doctor mark greene as he tried his best to save the life of a pregnant mother and her child .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the way she moved the camera and created tension throughout every scene was amazing .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: there was more excitement and adrenaline rushed suspense than just about any of hollywood's big blockbuster movies .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: so it's only natural that leder would get to direct her very own hollywood blockbuster .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and i have to say , after a shaky beginning , she does not disappoint .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: peacemaker deals with the theft of nuclear weapons by terrorists , which is obviously nothing new .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the first half hour goes into detail , way too much detail , about how the weapons are stolen .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: despite a few good images , including a train collision and a very impressive explosion , none of this was very coherent .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it's long and drawn out , and i would have settled with a more implausible beginning that would have moved the story along better .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: once george clooney and nicole kidman enter the picture , it begins to take off .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: george clooney is an air force colonel with connections all over the world .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he has a nice sarcastic wit and the rough edges that you expect from most clooney characters .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: nicole kidman is head of a white house team on weapons smuggling .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: there is the usual flirtatious banter between the two , but that is dispensed with quickly .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the story takes clooney and kidman across the globe , trying to figure out who has the weapons and where they are going with them . clooney
docs.label: positive

docs.text: goes through bouts of sarcasm , frustration , determination , and revenge while kidman works against her own insecurity and self-doubt .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this is when leder starts to show her true stuff .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: she starts us off with a nifty little car chase as an appetizer .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: then we get clooney doing heroics in and out of a helicopter .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: then that leads us to the brilliant final showdown on new york city's crowded streets , and a madman with a nuke walking among them .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: mimi leder is a natural at creating suspense .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: she reminds me of wolfgang petersen in her ability to make the most routine action sequences exciting and breathtaking .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: nicole kidman is an intelligent female action hero .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: you're not gonna find her falling down so clooney can come back to save her .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: george clooney is a real movie star .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: many of you may have hated him as batman , but this guy is for real .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he has a natural screen presence , and an ingratiating personality .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he'll be around for a while .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: dreamworks is off to a satisfying start with peacemaker .
docs.label: positive
